00020 
00021   void PolygonArea::AddPoint(real lat, real lon) throw() {
00022     if (_num == 0) {
00023       _lat0 = _lat1 = lat;
00024       _lon0 = _lon1 = lon;
00025     } else {
00026       real s12, S12, t;
00027       _earth.GenInverse(_lat1, _lon1, lat, lon, _mask, s12, t, t, t, t, t, S12);
00028       _perimetersum += s12;
00029       if (!_polyline) {
00030         _areasum += S12;
00031         _crossings += transit(_lon1, lon);
00032       }
00033       _lat1 = lat;
00034       _lon1 = lon;
00035     }
00036     ++_num;
00037   }
00038 
00039   unsigned PolygonArea::Compute(bool reverse, bool sign,
00040                                 real& perimeter, real& area) const throw() {
00041     real s12, S12, t;
00042     if (_num < 2) {
00043       perimeter = 0;
00044       if (!_polyline)
00045         area = 0;
00046       return _num;
00047     }
00048     if (_polyline) {
00049       perimeter = _perimetersum();
00050       return _num;
00051     }
00052     _earth.GenInverse(_lat1, _lon1, _lat0, _lon0, _mask,
00053                       s12, t, t, t, t, t, S12);
00054     perimeter = _perimetersum(s12);
00055     Accumulator<real> tempsum(_areasum);
00056     tempsum += S12;
00057     int crossings = _crossings + transit(_lon1, _lon0);
00058     if (crossings & 1)
00059       tempsum += (tempsum < 0 ? 1 : -1) * _area0/2;
00060     // area is with the clockwise sense.  If !reverse convert to
00061     // counter-clockwise convention.
00062     if (!reverse)
00063       tempsum *= -1;
00064     // If sign put area in (-area0/2, area0/2], else put area in [0, area0)
00065     if (sign) {
00066       if (tempsum > _area0/2)
00067         tempsum -= _area0;
00068       else if (tempsum <= -_area0/2)
00069         tempsum += _area0;
00070     } else {
00071       if (tempsum >= _area0)
00072         tempsum -= _area0;
00073       else if (tempsum < 0)
00074         tempsum += _area0;
00075     }
00076     area = 0 + tempsum();
00077     return _num;
00078   }
00079 
00080   unsigned PolygonArea::TestCompute(real lat, real lon, bool reverse, bool sign,
00081                                     real& perimeter, real& area) const throw() {
00082     if (_num == 0) {
00083       perimeter = 0;
00084       if (!_polyline)
00085         area = 0;
00086       return 1;
00087     }
00088     perimeter = _perimetersum();
00089     real tempsum = _polyline ? 0 : _areasum();
00090     int crossings = _crossings, num = _num + 1;
00091     for (int i = 0; i < (_polyline ? 1 : 2); ++i) {
00092       real s12, S12, t;
00093       _earth.GenInverse(i == 0 ? _lat1 : lat, i == 0 ? _lon1 : lon,
00094                         i != 0 ? _lat0 : lat, i != 0 ? _lon0 : lon,
00095                         _mask, s12, t, t, t, t, t, S12);
00096       perimeter += s12;
00097       if (!_polyline) {
00098         tempsum += S12;
00099         crossings += transit(i == 0 ? _lon1 : lon,
00100                              i != 0 ? _lon0 : lon);
00101       }
00102     }
00103 
00104     if (_polyline)
00105       return num;
00106 
00107     if (crossings & 1)
00108       tempsum += (tempsum < 0 ? 1 : -1) * _area0/2;
00109     // area is with the clockwise sense.  If !reverse convert to
00110     // counter-clockwise convention.
00111     if (!reverse)
00112       tempsum *= -1;
00113     // If sign put area in (-area0/2, area0/2], else put area in [0, area0)
00114     if (sign) {
00115       if (tempsum > _area0/2)
00116         tempsum -= _area0;
00117       else if (tempsum <= -_area0/2)
00118         tempsum += _area0;
00119     } else {
00120       if (tempsum >= _area0)
00121         tempsum -= _area0;
00122       else if (tempsum < 0)
00123         tempsum += _area0;
00124     }
00125     area = 0 + tempsum;
00126     return num;
00127   }
